revised_title: Highlights from the Royal Society's January 21, 1892, Presentation
tldr: This article presents a summary of various scientific observations, reports, and findings from the Royal Society of London for the year 1891. Topics covered include cyclone tracks in the South Indian Ocean, photographs of the Milky Way, average monthly cloudiness in the United States, and the history of Tussar Silk. Additionally, the article mentions the progress of science in weighing and measuring, the geology of Witwatersrand, and the toxic effects of matter accompanying the Tubercle Bacillus.
